nodes.text: Ubardian oil wrestling was a sport in which opponents would face one another in matches. One match, in which Notea, an Ubardian oil wrestler, gained an advantage over their opponent was broadcast via hologram in a cantina on the planet Sibensko 24 years after the Battle of Endor.
Ubardian oil wrestling first appeared in a hologram in the novel Bloodline, written by Claudia Gray and released on May 3, 2016.
